name: Department - level salary stats
query:
SELECT
    department AS "Department:Data:150",
    COUNT(*) AS "Employee Count:Int:100",
    AVG(salary) AS "Average Salary:Currency:120",
    MAX(salary) AS "Max Salary:Currency:120",
    MIN(salary) AS "Min Salary:Currency:120"
FROM
    `tabEmployee Details`
GROUP BY
    department
ORDER BY
    AVG(salary) DESC
